### Data Source

The data used for this analysis can be found [here](https://www.icpsr.umich.edu/web/NACJD/studies/4572). The demographic breakdown for the survey population can be found in the [Exploratory Analysis](EDA.html).

### Software and R Packages

All analyses and website development were conducted in RStudio, and the source code is publicly available on [Github](https://github.com/amr2371/prisonsurvey.github.io). The following RStudio libraries were loaded for this analysis: tidyverse, mgcv, modelr, patchwork, and viridis.
